title: Ummm, anyone else currently blocked out of their game?
body:
Just stuck on attempting to reconnect. Tried to relog and now it's doing the firewall thing.

Thank god it's only ranked...

replies.body: After trying to reconnect since posting this I finally got to a "skip match results" screen...was like great, guess my team gave up and surrendered.....but, turns out there is no history of the game, guess it just got terminated lol

Having no history of the game and being unable to reconnect are two of the symptoms of a drophack. 
It's likely that you got drophacked, only becoming more common now.
i got that, but after pressing it im stuck at a "the game has crashed, press to Reconnect" still, cant get out of it.
Well I'm in a new game now so lets see how this go
Yeah im locked out too, game finished, but says game crashed and tries to reconnect, been locked out for 2 hours :(
